Text:
I have to agree with Mr_Dawg

A lot of the stuff you post is just junk,sexual junk,useless porn crap.

Put some effort into your uploads,upload quality educational stuff.It's what people like\want 

No one expects you to become a top up loader  in a day or two but,with some effort you can achieve the status of up loaders like BBS or MANTESH just to name a couple,These guys really know how to upload good quality ebooks.
